title: Potted Plant
description: A leafy green plant in pot. Plant type varies by platform.
apple_vendor_description: This potted plant emoji on Apple devices features a vibrant, leafy green plant nestled within a smooth, rounded pot, rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and gentle 3D shading. The leaves display subtle gradients of color, suggesting healthy growth and vitality, while the pot has a polished, ceramic-like sheen. It's a charming symbol of nature, growth, new beginnings, or adding a touch of life and freshness to digital messages sent from Apple devices.
